results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, for n > 1: a(n) = A255127(A260438(n), a(A260439(n))).
comment: This is a more recursed variant of A260435.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10104
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(A000959(n+1)) = A003309(n+2). [Maps Lucky numbers to odd Ludic numbers.]
a(n) = a(2n)/2. [The even bisection halved gives the sequence back.]
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 30 2015
